channel.title: UnderCoding
channel.description: This blog is mainly about Kotlin compiler, wasm, JavaScript, and their ecosystems.

item.title: The last days of my type checker for JavaScript
item.description: TL;DR Last year, I started to work on the 2.0 version of my static type checker for JavaScript written in Rust, but, unfortunately, I see that nowadays, TypeScript won. The idea of strict type-checking for JavaScript is less popular than in 2019. Additionally, another way to bring stricter types into...
